name: sablenite
effect: Held: Allows Sableye to Mega Evolve into Mega Sableye.
short_effect: Held: Allows Sableye to Mega Evolve into Mega Sableye.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Sableye hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.
